description: This Java class is a Spring Boot exception handler annotated with @RestControllerAdvice. It provides centralized handling for validation and general exceptions throughout the application, returning structured HTTP responses.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller advice class that handles validation and generic exceptions globally in the application.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles MethodArgumentNotValidException by extracting field errors and returning a bad request response with details.

methods.name: handleConstraint
methods.description: Handles ConstraintViolationException by collecting constraint violation messages and returning a bad request response.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Handles all other exceptions, returning an internal server error response with exception details.
